## Greetings!

My name is Kenji Hayashi - I'm a PhD candidate in the Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology at the University of California, Los Angeles.

I'm a plant community ecologist and data scientist striving to understand the dynamics governing plant communities and distributions. I'm also passionate about R, statistics, open/reproducible science, and evidence-based approaches to STEM education.

**PhD in Ecology & Evolutionary Biology** | 2018 - Present
